amendment.description: To prohibit the manufacture, sale, or distribution in commerce of certain children's products and child care articles that contain specified phthalates.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4104 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4104 proposed by Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S1510-1515; text: CR S1512-1513) To prohibit the manufacture, sale, or distribution in commerce of certain children's products and child care articles that contain specified phthalates.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4104 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4104 proposed by Senator Feinstein.
